featured.text: At the moment EU tobacco manufacturers only have to put written health warnings on cigarette packets __(24)__

definition.zh_def: 歐洲聯盟，旨在促進歐洲國家之間的經濟和政治合作的組織。
definition.en_def: The European Union, an organization aimed at promoting economic and political cooperation among European countries.
definition.example: The EU has implemented various policies to enhance trade between member states.
